body.description: SheaMoisture Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Repair Shampoo for damaged hair is a sulfate-free, clarifying shampoo that removes buildup, while infusing hair with nourishing moisture. Perfect for those who regularly color, straighten, perm or heat style their hair, as well as kinky, curly or wavy natural styles. This hair repair shampoo is formulated with Jamaican Black Castor Oil and Shea Butter to help promote natural growth by strengthening damaged hair and chemically processed hair, reducing breakage and the resultant shedding. Peppermint Oil helps invigorate the scalp for a tingling experience. All Shea Moisture hair products are sustainably produced and cruelty-free, and contain no silicone, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, mineral oil or petrolatum. How to Use: Apply to wet hair, gently massage from root to ends. Rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary. For best results pair with Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore Conditioner. SheaMoisture's Story: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and entrepreneurs, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SheaMoisture's Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen & Restore paraben free shampoo and sulfate free shampoo is a damaged hair treatment for those who regularly color, straighten, perm or heat style their hair, as well as kinky, curly or wavy natural styles.

Cleanse & Hydrate Cleansing and hydrating ingredients, this shampoo removes buildup, while infusing hair with nourishing moisture. Together, We Give Back With every purchase, you support our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Tried, True & Cruelty-Free Tested on friends & family for generations—never on animals. Because of Her SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa.

Jamaican Black Castor Oil Leave-In Conditioner Jamaican Black Castor Oil Treatment Masque Jamaican Black Castor Oil Blow Dry Crème Main Benefit Smooth hair and restore shine to kinky, curly, or wavy natural styles with this leave-in conditioner. This deep conditioning hair masque restores strength and resilience to damaged, brittle or chemically processed hair. Expedite blow drying with this rich styling cream that controls frizz while defending against heat damage and breakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the past two years, SheaMoisture's Strengthen and Restore Shampoo for Damaged Hair has been my go-to solution for combating hair loss, recommended by my doctor. The impact it has had on my hair is nothing short of impressive. Notably, the visible reduction in hair loss during each wash has been a game-changer. What used to be a distressing sight in the drain has become a rarity, thanks to the shampoo's powerful blend of Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Shea Butter, and Peppermint.Consistent use of this shampoo has led to a remarkable transformation in my hair's resilience and overall health. The natural ingredients work providing me with a long-term solution rather than a temporary fix. My hair's texture has improved, and I've observed increased thickness, instilling confidence in the recovery of my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this shampoo but I got a bad batch cause my bottle separates really bad so I have to shake it up really good before each use. Will keep buying though as I’ve noticed a difference in the fullness, softness, and growth in my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using for years
reviews.reviewText: I've had dry damaged hair for years and keep coming back to this product because it keeps me clean and moisturized without weighing me down, I have thin wavy hair and use this intermittently between my anti-dandruff shampoo. The smell is fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love thisNice rich moisturizing shampoo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best shampoo, great for hair and scalp, great for dreads <3
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this shampoo. I found it when I had dreadlocks and was trying to find something better for my scalp and hair that would work with locs without the price of the "dreadlock shampoo" empires. It smells really good. It doesn't take much to use. Very long lasting and everyone in our family can use it. It has natural oils that leave hair soft, scalp moisturized and cooled from any itchiness or irritation and is overall better to avoid all the crap additives in shampoos and all. I personally would use a lil bit in a half gallon jug with water when i had locs in and use that to saturate and dilute it for washing. But when I had my locs out, I have fine type 2B hair and I don't find it is too oily or anything. Once you stop using garbage shampoos and begin using better products that actually care for your scalp and hair and use it for a bit you'll notice a huge difference. I highly recommend this product. The only reason I removed a star was because it came to us damaged, so that is more for Amazon than the actual product. The top of it was snapped off, and it wasn't even in the box, so they literally packaged it with it already broken and it leaked everywhere. I'd recommend getting the smaller container and not deal with the pump mechanic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this product. Makes my hair feel and smell amazing. Normally with other shampoos there's a slight residue but not here. Love it and sticking to it. Makes hair soft, smells amazing and fresh, and perfect for a wash before a detangle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my daughter's hair
reviews.reviewText: Great for my daughter's dry hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have fell in love with 😍 SheaMoisture Strength and Restore Shampoo Pure Jamaican Black Castor Oil 13 oz… I purchased some back in July 2023 and again this month. I will be purchasing everything within that line going forward. I ordered the conditioner today , lol and setting/styling lotion.It makes my hair feels so soft and clean and easy to comb through. Y’all I love it. Shea Moisture has a client for life as long they do not change the ingredients within this line products.
